Hotel Peralada Wine Spa & Golf

Hotel Peralada Wine Spa & Golf is a five-star boutique hotel in the heart of the Alt Empordà region, in Peralada, within easy reach of the Costa Brava's most beautiful beaches. Hotel Peralada Wine Spa and Golf has rooms with views over the resort golf course and features modern rooms with bright décor.

It is set on an 18-hole golf course and has 64 luxury rooms and a Wine Spa. You'll find The Olivera restaurant and two bars inside the hotel.

Few meters away there is a castle that belongs to the hotel, where you can find Castell Peralada restaurant (michelin star) and the famous Casino of Perlada. The Olivera restaurant features a terrace and serves Mediterranean cuisine. Guests can also take advantage of one free entry to the Castillo Casino.

Location: 1h 30 minutes from Barcelona

Category: 5 stars

Restaurants: 2 restaurants and 2 bars

Wifi: Available in rooms and common areas

Nr. Rooms: 64 rooms

Handicapped facilities: Yes

Swimmingpool: Yes. Outdoor and indoor

Check in/out: 3pm /noon

Meeting rooms: 16 rooms: min 3 pax, max 400 pax
